description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. RC Racing 360 is a racing game in which up to four players can challenge themselves to drive remote controlled cars into spectacular ambients. There are seven different tracks and six different vehicles, each one with its own unique graphic characterization and gameplay. This ensures frenetic competitions where each strategy is allowed.
